text: Yashoda is a 2022 Indian Telugu-language action thriller movie written and directed by Hariâ€“Harish. It stars Samantha in the title role alongside Unni Mukundan, Varalaxmi Sarathkumar, and Murali Sharma. Principal photography commenced in December 2021 and ended in July 2022. The film's score was composed by Mani Sharma, while the cinematography and editing were handled by M. Sukumar and Marthand K. Venkatesh, respectively. The film was released on 11 November 2022. Yashoda received mixed reviews from critics. ==References== == Other websites == * * Yashoda at Bollywood Hungama Category:Indian movies Category:Movies set in India Category:2022 action movies Category:2022 thriller movies Category:2020s action thriller movies Category:Movies about surrogacy Category:Movies about healthcare
title: Yashoda (movie)
